<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_715443_employee_pay_roll</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Insert payroll</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here

  var employee_object = g_form.getReference('employee_ref', callback);

    function callback(employee_object) {
        var setvalue = employee_object.final_payroll;
        g_form.setValue(setvalue, current.final_amount);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-15 11:52:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c3d3cb732fd00110fbf6b8e72799b65a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Insert payroll</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Employee Management System" source="x_715443_employee">25b9b017871001105880206f8bbb3595</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Management System">25b9b017871001105880206f8bbb3595</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c3d3cb732fd00110fbf6b8e72799b65a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-15 12:44:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c3d3cb732fd00110fbf6b8e72799b65a"/></record_update>
